Class Projectile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.painintheass.GameLogic.Projectile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FallingProjectile

    public class Projectile
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a missile. Arrows, magic missile, falling missiles...
